title: How to improve my vocabulary without reading books - Quora

response.answer_text: English series and movies. Go for the British ones as I think that there is less slang involved. Either way… you need to know the meaning of the word to comprehend the sentence(which can also be done by understanding the context, but you don't really get the exact thing at times).. so as long as you don't mind pausing the video every time you need to know the meaning of some new word- go for it. And I have one question here, why not books? You could actually start with some catchy and easy to read books and you will still learn so many words. :)

Improving vocabulary from books is really very tough nd boring job. There is many way to improve your vocabulary for example you can call at call center and try to talk in english people who sit in the company are not for judging your english they are hired for solving your problem. And imoroving eng is not one day job it must be a continuous process. You can read newspapaer online and many intersting blogs. I hope this will help you.
